name: Orb Hunter
description:
I’m Saud Alomari, I’m a passionate game developer, I’ve been hobby programming and developing with Unity for more than 5 years, and Orb Hunter is my serious project that put my skills in use and I would love to present it to you.
I started developing this game on October 2022.
Please contact me if you have any questions or feedback, I’d be glad to communicate with you.

Please check the Manual in the store page to know more about the objectives, controls and tips.
